Write-Up Text: The people of Australia are abuzz with opinions regarding the recently released Federal Budget. Some criticise the economic strategies proposed by politicians such as Peter Dutton while others applaud figures such as WA Premier Mark McGowan for their budget surplus accomplishments. Many are unimpressed with the budget's perceived lack of action on global problems such as nuclear arms and mental health crises while others welcome the news of lower electricity prices for some Queensland households. Overall the people have mixed opinions on the budget's effectiveness and impact on society.
